body_content.explanation: used when you are happy that something difficult or dangerous has finished or is not going to happen:
examples: Whew! It's over and we don't have to think about it any more.
Whew, I finally made it to the end of the book.
He came out of the interview and went, whew, that was tough.
Whew, that was close. I thought that car was going to hit us.

body_content.explanation: used to express surprise, pleasure, or admiration:
examples: When she was asked how much she earns now, she smiled and said, "Whew, that's pretty personal".
"Watching that boy play yesterday - whew ! - he is going to be something special," he said.

body_content.explanation: used to show that you are, or a place is, hot and uncomfortable:
used to show that you feel tired:
examples: Whew, that was a lot of work.
